title: Honeymoon for One
description: To escape local gossip, jilted bride Michelle Bradford embarks on her honeymoon cruise alone. Coaxed by a thrill seeking hunk she never expects to see again, she slowly sheds her good girl persona to have some well deserved fun.But unlike Vegas, what happens on the high seas doesn't always stay there. Her boring sensible reality is turned upside down when the expert hired to downsize her company walks in the door- Mr. Cruiseship Fling.
author: Chris Keniston
